trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Eidolon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Strengthening Bond
entries: Choose your Eidolon's Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution when you acquire your Eidolon for the first time. The chosen ability score increases by 2.
The Eidolon's {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} is always equal to yours.
You choose whether your Eidolon uses Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls of its natural weapons (X).

The natural weapon attacks of your Eidolon receive a bonus to their damage rolls equal to 1.5 x your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} (rounded down) if you choose Strength and half your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} (rounded down) if you choose Dexterity (Y).

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} +4 (X+PB) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8} + Y damage.

trait.name: Strengthening Bond
entries: Choose your Eidolon's Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution when you acquire your Eidolon for the first time. The chosen ability score increases by 2.
The Eidolon's {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} is always equal to yours.
You choose whether your Eidolon uses Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls of its natural weapons (X).

The natural weapon attacks of your Eidolon receive a bonus to their damage rolls equal to 1.5 x your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} (rounded down) if you choose Strength and half your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} (rounded down) if you choose Dexterity (Y).

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} +4 (X+PB) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8} + Y damage.

trait.name: Strengthening Bond
entries: Choose your Eidolon's Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution when you acquire your Eidolon for the first time. The chosen ability score increases by 2.
The Eidolon's {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} is always equal to yours.
You choose whether your Eidolon uses Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls of its natural weapons (X).

The natural weapon attacks of your Eidolon receive a bonus to their damage rolls equal to 1.5 x your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} (rounded down) if you choose Strength and half your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} (rounded down) if you choose Dexterity (Y).

trait.name: Versatile Skills
entries: Choose two additional skills for your Eidolon. You can change these skill any time you summon your Eidolon.
Alternatively, you can choose only one skill, but your Eidolon doubles its {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} for any skill check it makes with it.

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} +4 (X+PB) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8} + Y damage.

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor) + 2 (Defender only)

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The celestial makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Radiant Bow (Avenger Only)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 600 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d6 + 2 + summonSpellLevel} radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Mace (Defender Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} radiant damage, and the celestial can choose itself or another creature it can see within 10 feet of the target. The chosen creature gains {@dice 1d10} temporary hit points.

action.name: Healing Touch (1/Day)
entries: The celestial touches another creature. The target magically regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d8 + summonSpellLevel}.

ac.special: 13 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

trait.name: Heated Body (Metal Only)
entries: A creature that touches the construct or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes {@damage 1d10} fire damage.

trait.name: Stony Lethargy (Stone Only)
entries: When a creature the construct can see starts its turn within 10 feet of the construct, the construct can force it to make a Wisdom {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir} against your spell save DC. On a failed save, the target can't use {@variantrule Reaction|Ishiir|Reactions} and its {@variantrule Speed|Ishiir} is halved until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The construct makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Berserk Lashing (Clay Only)
entries: When the construct takes damage, it makes a slam attack against the triggering creature. If the creature is not within reach, the construct moves up to half its {@variantrule Speed|Ishiir} toward an enemy it can see, without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack|Ishiir|Opportunity Attacks}.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The item is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Irrepressible Dance
entries: When any creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the item, the item can increase or decrease (your choice) the walking speed of that creature by 10 feet until the end of the turn, provided the item isn't {@condition incapacitated|Ishiir}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dancing item makes a number of attacks equal to half your proficiency (rounded down).

action.name: Force-Empowered Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. {@h}{@damage 1d10 + PB} force damage.

hp.special: 5 + five times your ranger level (the drake has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to your ranger level)

immune.special: determined by the drake's draconic essence trait

trait.name: Skills
entries: The drake is {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir|proficient} in the {@skill Perception} and {@skill Stealth} skills.

trait.name: Draconic Essence
entries: When you summon the drake, choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. The chosen type determines the drake's damage {@variantrule Immunity|Ishiir} and the damage of its Infused Strikes trait.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d6} plus PB plus Strength modifier piercing damage.

action.name: Elemental Bolt
entries: {@atk rw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 120 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d6} plus PB damage of the type chosen for Draconic Essence.

bonus.name: Infused Strikes
entries: Choose a creature within 30 feet of your Drake Companion. Until the end of its next turn that creature deals {@damage 1d6} additional damage of the type chosen for Draconic Essence with its weapon attacks.

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

trait.name: Amorphous Form (Air, Fire, and Water Only)
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} bludgeoning damage (Earth only), fire damage (Fire only), lightning damage (Air only), or cold damage (Water only).

ac.special: 12 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Fey Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} psychic damage.

bonus.name: Fey Step
entries: The fey magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Then one of the following effects occurs, based on the fey's chosen mood:

items.name: Fuming
items.entry: The fey has {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on the next {@variantrule Attack Roll|Ishiir} it makes before the end of this turn.

items.name: Mirthful
items.entry: The fey can force one creature it can see within 10 feet of it to make a Wisdom {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir} against your spell save DC. Unless the save succeeds, the target is {@condition Charmed|Ishiir} by you and the fey for 1 minute or until the target takes any damage.

items.name: Tricksy
items.entry: The fey can fill a 5-foot cube within 5 feet of it with magical darkness, which lasts until the end of its next turn.

ac.special: 12 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

hp.special: 50 (Demon only) or 40 (Devil only) or 60 (Yugoloth only) + 15 for each spell level above 6th

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The fiend has {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir|Saving Throws} against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Death Throes (Demon Only)
entries: When the fiend drops to 0 hit points or the spell ends, the fiend explodes, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir} against your spell save DC. A creature takes {@damage 2d10 + summonSpellLevel} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Devil's Sight (Devil Only)
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fiend's darkvision.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fiend makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Bite (Demon Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} necrotic damage.

action.name: Claws (Yugoloth Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} slashing damage. Immediately after the attack hits or misses, the fiend can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Fiery Strike (Devil Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 5 ft., one target. {@atk rs} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The insect can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an {@variantrule Ability Check|Ishiir}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The insect makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

action.name: Poison Jab
entries: {@i Melee {@variantrule Attack Roll|Ishiir}:} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 10 ft. {@h}{@dice 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} Piercing damage plus {@damage 1d4} Poison damage.

action.name: Web Bolt (Spider Only)
entries: {@i Ranged {@variantrule Attack Roll|Ishiir}:} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, range 60 ft. {@h}{@dice 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} Bludgeoning damage, and the target's {@variantrule Speed|Ishiir} is reduced to 0 until the start of the insect's next turn if it is Huge size or smaller.

bonus.name: Venomous Spew (Centipede Only)
entries: {@i Constitution {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir}:} Your spell save DC, one creature the insect can see within 10 feet. {@i Failure:} The target has the {@condition Poisoned|Ishiir} condition until the start of the insect's next turn.

hp.special: 20 + 15 per spell level (the steed has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to the spell's level)

trait.name: Life Bond
entries: When you regain Hit Points, the steed regains the same number of Hit Points if you're within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Otherworldly Slam
entries: {@i Melee {@variantrule Attack Roll|Ishiir}:} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 5 ft. {@h}{@dice 1d8 + summonSpellLevel} of Radiant (Celestial), Psychic (Fey), or Necrotic (Fiend) damage.

bonus.name: Fell Glare (Fiend Only; Recharges after a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir})
entries: {@i Wisdom {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir}:} DC equals your spell save DC, one creature within 60 feet the steed can see. {@i Failure:} The target has the {@condition Frightened|Ishiir} condition until the end of your next turn.

bonus.name: Fey Step (Fey Only; Recharges after a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir})
entries: The steed teleports, along with its rider, to an unoccupied space of your choice up to 60 feet away from itself.

bonus.name: Healing Touch (Celestial Only; Recharges after a {@variantrule Long Rest|Ishiir})
entries: One creature within 5 feet of the steed regains a number of Hit Points equal to {@dice 2d8 + summonSpellLevel}.

trait.name: Strengthening Bond
entries: Choose your Eidolon's Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution when you acquire your Eidolon for the first time. The chosen ability score increases by 2.
The Eidolon's {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} is always equal to yours.
You choose whether your Eidolon uses Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls of its natural weapons (X).

The natural weapon attacks of your Eidolon receive a bonus to their damage rolls equal to 1.5 x your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} (rounded down) if you choose Strength and half your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} (rounded down) if you choose Dexterity (Y).

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} +4 (X+PB) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8} + Y damage.

trait.name: Strengthening Bond
entries: Choose your Eidolon's Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution when you acquire your Eidolon for the first time. The chosen ability score increases by 2.
The Eidolon's {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} is always equal to yours.
You choose whether your Eidolon uses Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls of its natural weapons (X).

The natural weapon attacks of your Eidolon receive a bonus to their damage rolls equal to 1.5 x your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} (rounded down) if you choose Strength and half your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} (rounded down) if you choose Dexterity (Y).

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} +4 (X+PB) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8} + Y damage.

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

trait.name: Terror Frenzy (Fury Only)
entries: The spirit has {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir} on {@variantrule Attack Roll|Ishiir|Attack Rolls} against {@condition Frightened|Ishiir} creatures.

trait.name: Weight of Sorrow (Despair Only)
entries: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its {@variantrule Speed|Ishiir} reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Chilling Rend
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} cold damage.

action.name: Dreadful Scream (1/Day)
entries: The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir} against your spell save DC or be {@condition Frightened|Ishiir} for 1 minute. The {@condition Frightened|Ishiir} creature can repeat the {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir} at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Shadow Stealth (Fear Only)
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the spirit takes the Hide action.
The creature receives a bonus to this skill check equal to your spell attack bonus.

trait.name: Strengthening Bond
entries: Choose your Eidolon's Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution when you acquire your Eidolon for the first time. The chosen ability score increases by 2.
The Eidolon's {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} is always equal to yours.
You choose whether your Eidolon uses Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls of its natural weapons (X).

The natural weapon attacks of your Eidolon receive a bonus to their damage rolls equal to 1.5 x your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} (rounded down) if you choose Strength and half your {@variantrule Proficiency|Ishiir} (rounded down) if you choose Dexterity (Y).

action.name: Strike
entries: {@atk mw} +4 (X+PB) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8} + Y damage.

ac.special: 13 + the level of the spell +2 (Fighter only)

hp.special: 30 (Barbarian and Fighter only) or 20 (Monk only) + 10 for each spell level above 3rd

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warrior makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Reckless Strike (Barbarian Only)
entries: {@atk mw} your spell attack modifier to hit (with {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir}), reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d12 + 3} + the spell's level force damage, and attacks made against the warrior until the start of its next turn are made with {@variantrule Advantage|Ishiir}.

action.name: Rallying Strike (Fighter Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 3} + the spell's level force damage, and the warrior can choose another creature it can see within 20 feet of itself. The chosen creature gains {@dice 1d6} temporary hit points.

action.name: Unarmed Strike (Monk Only)
entries: {@atk mw} your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d4 + 3} + the spell's level force damage, and the target must succeed on a Strength {@variantrule Saving Throw|Ishiir} against your spell save DC or be knocked {@condition Prone|Ishiir}.

bonus.name: Flurry of Blows (Monk Only)
entries: The monk makes one {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|Ishiir} attack.

trait.name: Draconic Blood
entries: Choose Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. The Wyvern Companion has {@variantrule Resistance|Ishiir} in the chosen element.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6} + 3 piercing damage.

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

hp.special: 20 (Air only) or 30 (Land and Water only) + 5 for each spell level above 2nd

trait.name: Water Breathing (Water Only)
entries: The beast can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Flyby (Air Only)
entries: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Pack Tactics (Land and Water Only)
entries: The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} piercing damage.

ac.special: 14 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

hp.special: 50 + 10 for each spell level above 5th (the dragon has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to the level of the spell)

trait.name: Shared Resistances
entries: When you summon the dragon, choose one of its damage resistances. You have resistance to the chosen damage type until the spell ends.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes a number of Rend attacks equal to half the spell's level (rounded down), and it uses Breath Weapon.

action.name: Rend
entries: {@atk mw} your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The dragon exhales destructive energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC. A creature takes {@damage 2d6} * half the spell's level (rounded down) damage of a type this dragon has resistance to (your choice) on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (natural armor)

hp.special: 30 (Ghostly and Putrid only) or 20 (Skeletal only) + 10 for each spell level above 3rd

trait.name: Incorporeal Passage (Ghostly Only)
entries: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes {@damage 1d10} force damage for every 5 feet traveled.

trait.name: Festering Aura (Putrid Only)
entries: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Deathly Touch (Ghostly Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition frightened} of the undead until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Grave Bolt (Skeletal Only)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d4 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} necrotic damage.

action.name: Rotting Claw (Putrid Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} slashing damage. If the target is {@condition poisoned}, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.
